Member – User Profile, User Registration, Login &amp; Membership Plugin";s:4:"slug";s:15:"ultimate-member";s:7:"version";s:6:"2.1.13";s:6:"author";s:56:"<a href="http://ultimatemember.com/">Ultimate Member</a>";s:14:"author_profile";s:45:"https://profiles.wordpress.org/ultimatemember";s:8:"requires";s:3:"5.0";s:6:"tested";s:3:"5.6";s:12:"requires_php";s:3:"5.6";s:6:"rating";i:88;s:7:"ratings";a:5:{i:5;i:893;i:4;i:59;i:3;i:24;i:2;i:36;i:1;i:123;}s:11:"num_ratings";i:1135;s:15:"support_threads";i:442;s:24:"support_threads_resolved";i:376;s:10:"downloaded";i:4401321;s:12:"last_updated";s:21:"2020-12-09 9:05am GMT";s:5:"added";s:10:"2015-01-21";s:8:"homepage";s:26:"http://ultimatemember.com/";s:8:"sections";a:5:{s:11:"description";s:9623:"<h4>Best User Profile &amp; Membership Plugin for WordPress</h4>
<p>Ultimate Member is the #1 user profile &amp; membership plugin for WordPress. The plugin makes it a breeze for users to sign-up and become members of your website. The plugin allows you to add beautiful user profiles to your site and is perfect for creating advanced online communities and membership sites. Lightweight and highly extendible, Ultimate Member will enable you to create almost any type of site where users can join and become members with absolute ease.</p>
<h4>Features of the plugin include:</h4>
<ul>
<li>Front-end user profiles</li>
<li>Front-end user registration</li>
<li>Front-end user login</li>
<li>Custom form fields</li>
<li>Conditional logic for form fields</li>
<li>Drag and drop form builder</li>
<li>User account page</li>
<li>Custom user roles</li>
<li>Member directories</li>
<li>User emails</li>
<li>Content restriction</li>
<li>Conditional nav menus</li>
<li>Show author posts &amp; comments on user profiles</li>
<li>Developer friendly with dozens of actions and filters</li>
</ul>
<p>Read about all of the plugin&#8217;s features at <a href="https://ultimatemember.com" rel="nofollow ugc">Ultimate Member</a></p>
<h4>Paid Extensions</h4>
<p>Ultimate Member has a range of extensions that allow you to extend the power of the plugin. You can purchase all of these extensions at a significant discount with our <a href="https://ultimatemember.com/pricing/" rel="nofollow ugc">All Access Pass</a> or you can purchase extensions individually.</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/user-notes/" rel="nofollow ugc">User Notes</a> &#8211; Allow users to create public and private notes from their profile</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/profile-tabs/" rel="nofollow ugc">Profile Tabs</a> &#8211; Allow to add the custom tabs to profiles</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/user-locations/" rel="nofollow ugc">User Locations</a> &#8211; Allow to display users on a map on the member directory page and allow users to add their location via their profile</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/unsplash/" rel="nofollow ugc">Unsplash</a> &#8211; Allow users to select a profile cover photo from <a href="https://unsplash.com/" rel="nofollow ugc">Unsplash</a> from their profile</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/user-bookmarks/" rel="nofollow ugc">User Bookmarks</a> &#8211; Allow users to bookmark content from your website</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/user-photos/" rel="nofollow ugc">User Photos</a> &#8211; Allow users to upload photos to their profile</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/groups/" rel="nofollow ugc">Groups</a> &#8211; Allow users to create and join groups around shared topics, interests etc.</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/private-content/" rel="nofollow ugc">Private Content</a> &#8211; Display private content to logged in users that only they can access</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/user-tags/" rel="nofollow ugc">User Tags</a> &#8211; Lets you add a user tag system to your website</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/social-activity/" rel="nofollow ugc">Social Activity</a> &#8211; Let users create public wall posts &amp; see the activity of other users</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/woocommerce/" rel="nofollow ugc">WooCommerce</a> &#8211; Allow you to integrate WooCommerce with Ultimate Member</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/private-messages/" rel="nofollow ugc">Private Messages</a> &#8211; Add a private messaging system to your site &amp; allow users to message each other</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/followers/" rel="nofollow ugc">Followers</a> &#8211; Allow users to follow each other on your site and protect their profile information</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/real-time-notifications/" rel="nofollow ugc">Real-time Notifications</a> &#8211; Add a notifications system to your site so users can receive real-time notifications</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/social-login/" rel="nofollow ugc">Social Login</a> &#8211; Let users register &amp; login to your site via Facebook, Twitter, G+, LinkedIn, Instagram and Vkontakte (VK.com)</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/bbpress/" rel="nofollow ugc">bbPress</a> &#8211; With the bbPress extension you can beautifully integrate Ultimate Member with bbPress</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/mailchimp/" rel="nofollow ugc">MailChimp</a> &#8211; Allow users to subscribe to your MailChimp lists when they signup on your site and sync user meta to MailChimp</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/user-reviews/" rel="nofollow ugc">User Reviews</a> &#8211; Allow users to rate &amp; review each other using a 5 star rate/review system</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/verified-users/" rel="nofollow ugc">Verified Users</a> &#8211; Add a user verification system to your site so user accounts can be verified</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/mycred/" rel="nofollow ugc">myCRED</a> &#8211; With the myCRED extension you can integrate Ultimate Member with the popular myCRED points management plugin</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/notices/" rel="nofollow ugc">Notices</a> &#8211; Alert users to important information using conditional notices</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/profile-completeness/" rel="nofollow ugc">Profile Completeness</a> &#8211; Encourage or force users to complete their profiles with the profile completeness extension</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/friends/" rel="nofollow ugc">Friends</a> &#8211; Allows users to become friends by sending &amp; accepting/rejecting friend requests</li>
</ul>
<h4>Free Extensions</h4>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/jobboardwp/" rel="nofollow ugc">JobsBoardWP</a> &#8211; This free extension integrates Ultimate Member with the job board plugin <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/jobboardwp">JobBoardWP</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/forumwp/" rel="nofollow ugc">ForumWP</a> &#8211; This free extension integrates Ultimate Member with the forum plugin <a href="https://forumwpplugin.com" rel="nofollow ugc">ForumWP</a>.</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/terms-conditions/" rel="nofollow ugc">Terms &amp; Conditions</a> &#8211; Add a terms and condition checkbox to your registration forms &amp; require users to agree to your T&amp;Cs before registering on your site.</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/google-recaptcha/" rel="nofollow ugc">Google reCAPTCHA</a> &#8211; Stop bots on your registration &amp; login forms with Google reCAPTCHA</li>
<li><a href="https://ultimatemember.com/extensions/online-users/" rel="nofollow ugc">Online Users</a> &#8211; Display what users are online with this extension</li>
</ul>
<h4>Theme</h4>
<p>Our official <a href="https://ultimatemember.com/theme/" rel="nofollow ugc">theme</a> is purpose built for websites that have logged in and out users. The <a href="https://ultimatemember.com/theme/" rel="nofollow ugc">theme</a> has deep integration with Ultimate Member plugin and the extensions, different header designs for logged-in/out users and works alongside the Beaver Builder and Elementor page builders.</p>
<h4>Our other plugins</h4>
<p>In addition to Ultimate Member, we also have two other plugins: <a href="https://forumwpplugin.com/" rel="nofollow ugc">ForumWP</a> and <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/jobboardwp">JobBoardWP</a>.</p>
<h4>ForumWP</h4>
<p><a href="https://forumwpplugin.com/" rel="nofollow ugc">ForumWP</a> is a forum plugin which adds an online forum to your website, allowing users to create topics and write replies. Forums are a great way to build and grow an online community.</p>
<h4>JobBoardWP</h4>
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/jobboardwp">JobBoardWP</a> is a job board plugin which adds a modern job board to your website. Display job listings and allow employers to submit and manage jobs all from the front-end.</p>
<h4>Development * Translations</h4>
<p>If you&#8217;re a developer and would like to contribute to the source code of the plugin you can do so via our <a href="https://github.com/ultimatemember/ultimatemember" rel="nofollow ugc">GitHub Repository</a>.</p>
<p>Want to add a new language to Ultimate Member? Great! You can contribute via <a href="https://translate.wordpress.org/projects/wp-plugins/ultimate-member" rel="nofollow ugc">translate.wordpress.org</a>.</p>
<p>If you are a developer and you need to know the list of UM Hooks, make this via our <a href="https://docs.ultimatemember.com/article/1324-hooks-list" rel="nofollow ugc">Hooks Documentation</a>.</p>
<p>If you are a developer and you need to know the structure of our code, make this via our <a href="https://ultimatemember.com/php-docs/" rel="nofollow ugc">Documentation API</a>.</p>
<h4>Documentation &amp; Support</h4>
<p>Got a problem or need help with Ultimate Member? Head over to our <a href="http://docs.ultimatemember.com/" rel="nofollow ugc">documentation</a> and perform a search of the knowledge base. If you can’t find a solution to your issue then you can create a topic on the <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/ultimate-member">support forum</a>.</p>
";s:12:"installation";s:268:"<ol>
<li>Activate the plugin</li>
<li>That&#8217;s it. Go to Ultimate Member &gt; Settings to customize plugin options</li>
<li>For more details, please visit the official <a href="http://docs.ultimatemember.com/" rel="nofollow ugc">Documentation</a> page.</li>
</ol>
";s:3:"faq";s:1298:"
<h4>
Do I need to know any coding to use this plugin?
</h4>
<p>
<p>No, we have built Ultimate Member to be extremely easy to use and does not require you to manually build shortcodes or have any coding knowledge.</p>
</p>
<h4>
Is Ultimate Member mobile responsive?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes. Ultimate Member is designed to adapt nicely to any screen resolution. It includes specific designs for phones, tablets and desktops.</p>
</p>
<h4>
Is Ultimate Member multi-site compatible?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes. Ultimate Member works great on both single site and multi-site WordPress installs.</p>
</p>
<h4>
Does the plugin work with any WordPress theme?
</h4>
<p>
<p>Yes. Ultimate Member will work with any properly coded theme. However, some themes may cause conflicts with the plugin. If you find a styling issue with your theme please create a post in the community forum.</p>
</p>
<h4>
Does the plugin work with caching plugins?
</h4>
<p>
<p>The plugin works with popular caching plugins by automatically excluding Ultimate Member pages from being cached. This ensures other visitors to a page will not see the private information of another user. However, if you add features of Ultimate Member to other pages you have to exclude those pages from being cached through your cache plugin settings panel.</p>
</p>

";s:9:"changelog";s:114952:"<h4>Important:</h4>
<ul>
<li>To learn more about version 2.1 please see this <a href="https://docs.ultimatemember.com/article/1512-upgrade-2-1-0" rel="nofollow ugc">docs</a></li>
<li>UM2.1+ is a significant update to the Member Directories&#8217; code base from 2.0.x. Please make sure you take a full-site backup with restore point before updating the plugin</li>
</ul>
<h4>2.1.13: December 8, 2020</h4>
<ul>
<li>
<p>Enhancements:</p>
<ul>
<li>Added: <code>um_member_directory_cover_image_size</code> hook with ability to change the cover photo size on the member directory</li>
<li>Added: <code>um_member_directory_avatar_image_size</code> hook with ability to change the profile photo size on the member directory</li>
<li>Added: <code>um_member_directory_get_members_allow</code> JS hook for 3rd-party integration with the member directory. You could use a time throttle until some data is loaded</li>
<li>Added: Notice about the fields&#8217; conditional logic rules + small CSS enhancements</li>
<li>Added: Invalid nonce validation on Login and Registration pages instead of wp_die()</li>
<li>Added: Privacy settings for the Divider field type (#688)</li>
<li>Added: Ability for the integration with Gutenberg Block restriction settings (extends the block restriction settings via 3rd-party plugins)</li>
<li>Added: Strings translations</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p>Bugfixes:</p>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: Upgrade process on websites where a hosting locks the frequent AJAX requests (added default JS throttle between requests)</li>
<li>Fixed: Getting page content of the GDPR privacy policies</li>
<li>Fixed: Password strength validation for Unicode symbols</li>
<li>Fixed: Issue with apostrophe options in the multiselect/checkbox fields (#689)</li>
<li>Fixed: Translation for Password field&#8217;s label</li>
<li>Fixed: Download Personal Data URL</li>
<li>Fixed: Vulnerability with timestamp field on UM Forms (the hidden field with name=&#8217;timestamp&#8217; is deprecated)</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p>Tweaks:</p>
<ul>
<li>There are changed PHP’s intval(), strval(), floatval(), and boolval() typecasting functions to (int), (string), (float) and (bool) regarding <a href="https://make.wordpress.org/core/2020/11/20/miscellaneous-developer-focused-changes-in-wordpress-5-6/" rel="nofollow ugc">this doc</a>.</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>

<li>Fixed member directory roles in query (the case when selected some roles, but current user can see another only)</li>
<li>Fixed member directory sorting</li>
<li>Fixed member directory list dropdown init after changing view type</li>
<li>Fixed member directory admin filtering by the &#8216;user_registered&#8217; field</li>
<li>Fixed validation when using HTML in textarea</li>
<li>Fixed cleaning user old uploads</li>
<li>Fixed conditional logic for file/image-type fields</li>
<li>Fixed &#8220;get_profile_photo_size&#8221; function (avoid PHP notice with array_combine)</li>
<li>Fixed password reset/change form when other forms are initialized at the same page</li>
<li>Fixed getting extension updates on multisites</li>
<li>Fixed the &#8216;wp_authenticate_user&#8217; filter&#8217;s variables (changed username string to WP_User object)</li>
<li>Fixed SEO link canonical for the profile page</li>
<li>Fixed displaying error &amp; notice when the text is empty</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p>Deprecated:</p>
<ul>
<li>Deprecated JS event &#8216;um_before_modal_removed&#8217;, use wp.hooks action &#8216;um_before_modal_removed&#8217; instead</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>

<li>Fixed issue with reset filters on member directory</li>
<li>Fixed getting image/file custom fields values in form submission with not validated values</li>
<li>Fixed JS handlers for select-type filters with callback and parent/child relations</li>
<li>Fixed um_convert_tags for array-type values</li>
<li>Fixed small CSS issues</li>
</ul>

<h4>2.1.2: December 4, 2019</h4>

<p>Enhancements:</p>

<li>Added universal hook for field&#8217;s wrapper and improve rendering the field wrapper attributes</li>

<li>Added Form fields validation for E-mail( not unique )</li>
<li>Added $user_id attribute in update profile hooks for proper callbacks</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p>Bugfixes:</p>
<ul>
<li>Fixed fields privacy, editable and visibility attributes</li>
<li>Fixed member directory styles</li>
<li>Fixed random sorting</li>
<li>Fixed conflict with &#8216;php_data&#8217; variable in admin JS</li>
<li>Fixed datepicker/timepicker filtering in the member directories</li>
<li>Fixed initialization of datepicker, timepicker, slider filters when the &#8220;Show results only after search/filtration&#8221; option is active</li>
<li>Fixed callback select-type filters handlers on member directories filters bar</li>
<li>Fixed cover photo thumbnail sizes in member directory</li>
<li>Fixed Role filter</li>
<li>Fixed clearing filters with || condition</li>
<li>Fixed endless recursion in the function um_check_conditions_on_submit()</li>
<li>Fixed issue that appears if we try to update several plugins at once</li>
<li>Fixed using different templates for different member directories</li>
<li>Fixed form previews, added overlay and displayed buttons</li>
<li>Fixed wp-admin/admin-post.php access issue</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<h4>2.1.1: November 12, 2019</h4>

<li>Bugfixes:
<ul>
<li>Fixed admin actions hook</li>

<li>Fixed member directory search if &#8216;roles_can_search&#8217; is set</li>

<li>Fixed save profile with Last Login field</li>
<li>Fixed admin builder for profile form, show not editable fields</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<h4>2.1.0: November 11, 2019</h4>
<ul>
<li>
<p>Enhancements:</p>
<ul>
<li>Added member directory list view</li>
<li>Added member directory search bar</li>
<li>Added member directory filters by range, date and time</li>
<li>Added AJAXed member directories</li>
<li>Updated member directories&#8217; search engine</li>
<li>Additional parameter &#8216;user_id&#8217; to action hook &#8216;um_user_after_updating_profile&#8217;</li>
<li>Added ability to set profile/cover image sizes from Ultimate Member -&gt; General -&gt; Uploads settings or Original size</li>
<li>Added ability edit cover photo HTML (e.g. for adding some HTML attributes. See how add srcset attribute based on all generated cover sizes <a href="https://docs.ultimatemember.com/article/1519-change-cover-photo-html" rel="nofollow ugc">here</a>)</li>
<li>Added custom date format for Date Picker field</li>
<li>Added hook &#8216;um_show_meta_item_html&#8217; to customize user meta HTML at User Profile page</li>
<li>Added &#8220;aria-label&#8221; attribute in Field icon</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p>Bugfixes:</p>
<ul>
<li>Optimized usermeta for Account submit security</li>
<li>Fixed flushing rewrite rules on every page reloading</li>
<li>Fixed Gmail &amp; Yahoo UTF-8 encoding of email notification subject</li>
<li>Fixed ajax_resize_image() process</li>
<li>Fixed country fields values</li>
<li>Fixed dynamic_profile.php notice</li>
<li>Fixed integration with WP native admin_post and admin_post_nopriv requests</li>
<li>Fixed profile image settings</li>
<li>Fixed profile privacy for not logged in users, if restriction options set for profile page as visible only for logged in and showing message instead of redirect<br />
(it makes the same for {site_url}/user and {site_url}/user/{user_slug} )</li>
<li>Fixed security issue on registration form submission when username or email have conditional logic</li>
<li>Fixed RTL styles issues on user profile and account pages</li>
<li>Fixed upload profile/cover photos at the profile page, don&#8217;t apply until the crop finished</li>
<li>Fixed alphabetical field validation for cyrillic and not UTF-8 symbols</li>
<li>Fixed user profile validation if username, username or email, password and email fields were added to form</li>
<li>Fixed user profile preview in admin Form Builder</li>
<li>Fixed getting templates function for some Windows servers</li>
<li>Fixed plugin update process for multisites</li>
<li>Fixed function &#8220;um_apply_conditions&#8221;. An error appears with jQuery v2.1.3</li>
<li>Localized um-raty.js library</li>
<li>Localized strings</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>

<ul>
<li>
<p>Enhancements:</p>
<ul>
<li>Added support for GDPR Personal Data Exporter</li>
<li>Added support for GDPR Personal Data Eraser</li>
<li>Added new privacy field to form builder for GDPR consent collection</li>
<li>Added GDPR privacy policy guide text</li>
<li>Added GDPR compatibility on delete user process</li>
<li>Added security to Restricted posts comments</li>
<li>Added security to custom field type <code>Password</code></li>
<li>Deprecated time checking spam bot</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p>Bugfixes:</p>
<ul>
<li>Fixed settings tabs for PHP7.1</li>
<li>Fixed issues with Profile Tabs</li>
<li>Fixed User Avatars</li>
<li>Fixed set user status on Registration process</li>
<li>Fixed Account Privacy tab content</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>

</ul>

</ul>

<h4>2.0.4: April 10, 2018</h4>
<ul>
<li>
<p>Enhancements:</p>
<ul>
<li>Added activation dependencies for extensions</li>
<li>Added Licenses checking and changed Licenses page</li>
<li>Added uninstall.php file for delete permanently all UM settings</li>
<li>Added ability to register users without WP Registration enabled</li>
<li>Added visual integration WPML+UM email notifications</li>
<li>Added Account Upgrade email notification</li>
<li>Added ability to register users using role field on Registration Form</li>
<li>Added Account page shortcodes for each tab content</li>
<li>Changed UM Option View (deprecated/added options)</li>
<li>Changed UM Roles, optimized for WP native logic</li>
<li>Changed backend forms/fields to WP native styles</li>
<li>Changed Content Restriction feature for posts, taxonomies, menus</li>
<li>Changed Email Notifications settings and using templates logic</li>
<li>Deprecated Redux Framework</li>
<li>Deprecated old unusable options</li>
<li>Deprecated old unusable forms metadata</li>
<li>Deprecated old unusable member directories metadata</li>
<li>Deprecated old unusable user roles metadata</li>
<li>Optimized registration/upgrade profile process (some hook deprecated)</li>
<li>Optimized some code parts, deprecated some functions</li>
<li>Updated <code>FontAwesome</code> library</li>
<li>Removed addons to separate extensions</li>
<li>Created Plugin Updater for getting updates and license details from Shop</li>
<li>Increased integration abilities, added new hooks (see new Hooks Docs + PHP documentation);</li>
<li>Integrated plugin activation, user creation processes with multisite</li>
<li>Make dependencies with extensions</li>
<li>OOP structure without procedural methods for wp-admin side;</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p>Bugfixes:</p>
<ul>
<li>Fixed avatars on some SSL installs</li>
<li>Fixed some vulnerabilities</li>
<li>Fixed integrations with core/extensions</li>
<li>Fixed <code>Edit Profile</code> button at members directory</li>
<li>Fixed conditional logic PHP validation and JS validation (for IE,Edge browsers)</li>
<li>Fixed textdomains for translations</li>
<li>Fixed integration with Woocommerce, SEO Framework, WPML</li>
<li>Fixed navigation menu items custom fields (<code>Mega Menu</code>, etc. compatibility)</li>
<li>Fixed theme conflicts with UM js libraries</li>
<li>Fixed and optimized handlers for user permalinks</li>
<li>Fixed replace placeholders for users</li>
<li>Fixed conditional fields logic</li>
<li>Fixed fields sanitize for remove XSS injections</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>

<h4>1.3.73: November 17, 2016</h4>
<ul>
<li>
<p>Enhancements:</p>
<ul>
<li>Adds a filter hook to modify the submitted details on registration process
<ul>
<li><code>um_before_save_filter_submitted</code></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Adds a filter hook to disable canonical link in header
<ul>
<li><code>um_allow_canonical__filter</code></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Adds a filter hook to modify the auto-generated email address on registration process
<ul>
<li><code>um_user_register_submitted__email</code></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Adds filter hooks to modify locale, language file path and textdomain
<ul>
<li><code>um_language_textdomain</code></li>
<li><code>um_language_locale</code></li>
<li><code>um_language_file</code></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Adds filter hook to modify the data of selected value:
<ul>
<li><code>um_is_selected_filter_data</code></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Adds new select/multi-select options to retrieve options from a callback.
<ul>
<li>In the form builder, edit or add a select/multi-select field and add your callback function in <code>Choices callback</code> field to get populated.</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Adds parent select field option to dynamically populate another select field.
<ul>
<li>If <code>Choices Callback</code> option is set in the field settings,  the <code>Parent Option</code> triggers an Ajax request to populate the child options on <code>change</code> event.</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Updates <code>um.min.js</code> file.</li>
<li>Updates <code>en_US</code> translation file.</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p>Bugfixes:</p>
<ul>
<li>Removes notices from WPCLI console.</li>
<li>Removes notices from edit profile mode</li>
<li>Removes autocomplete from search filter fields</li>
<li>Fix translation strings of search filters on a member directory</li>
<li>Fix email notifications not sending on registration process</li>
<li>Fix field selection with special characters on form submission</li>
<li>Fix assigning of role on register submission process</li>
</ul>

<h4>1.3.72: October 10, 2016</h4>
<ul>
<li>
<p>Enhancements:</p>

<li>Improves the bulk filters, actions and redirection in <code>User Screens</code></li>

<li>Adds Textarea to show in profile tagline on Member Directory</li>
<li>Adds a filter hook <code>um_allow_frontend_image_uploads</code> to allow profile and cover photo uploads on front-end pages.</li>
<li>Adds new filter hooks to modify image field data on upload:
<ul>
<li><code>um_image_handle_global__option</code></li>
<li><code>um_image_handle_{$field}__option</code></li>
</ul>
</li>

<ul>
<li><code>um_locate_user_profile_not_loggedin__redirect</code></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Improves generate dummies tool with <code>wp_remote_get</code></li>

<ul>
<li><code>um_cover_area_content</code></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Updates the English translation .po and .mo files.</li>
<li>Improves the shortcode <code>um_show_content</code> to swap the <code>user_id</code> with the current profile.</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p>Bugfixes:</p>
<ul>
<li>Fixes a bug where multi-select field options doesn&#8217;t match the user selected options that contain html entities.</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to display correct role slugs in radio and select fields.</li>
<li>Fixes a bug where reset password form is conflicting with register and login form on a page.</li>
<li>Fixes a bug where Users queue count in the Admin &gt; <code>All Users / Users</code> menu doesn&#8217;t update when a user account is in <code>pending user review</code> and gets deleted.</li>
<li>Fixes a typo in Password Reset Email option&#8217;s description</li>
<li>Fixes a bug where conditional fields &#8216;equals to&#8217; validation on registration process</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to disable the query with hiding account on member directory</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to retrieve specific number of members </li>
<li>Fixes a bug to retrieve all members with <code>get_members</code> new parameter <code>number</code></li>
<li>Fixes a typo in Welcome Email template.</li>
<li>Fixes a bug where login form redirection is set to <code>wp-admin/admin-ajax.php</code> instead of the current page when loaded via ajax.</li>
<li>Fixes a bug where uninstall link doesn&#8217;t load.</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to redirect users to correct URL after login based from login options.</li>
<li>Fixes a bug where non-logged in users are not able to access the profile page when <code>Global Site Access</code> is set to <code>Site accessible to Logged In Users</code>.</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to modify the login redirection url especially when DOING_AJAX is defined.</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to retrieve correct community roles per site in a Multisite Network setup.</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>

<h4>1.3.69: September 08, 2016</h4>
<ul>
<li>
<p>Enhancements:</p>
<ul>
<li>Adds a system information tool for support purposes</li>
<li>Adds a new option to disable generating profile slugs on every load of member directory pages.
<ul>
<li>Located in UM &gt; Settings &gt; Advanced &gt; Stop generating profile slugs in member directory.</li>
<li>This improves the performance when loading profiles in directories. It generates profile slug on Profile Update ( front and back-end ), Registration Process and viewing the Users in the back-end.</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Adds new filter hook <code>um_activate_url</code> to modify the account activation url.</li>
<li>Adds new filter hooks to modify first and last name cases
<ul>
<li><code>um_user_first_name_case</code> </li>
<li><code>um_user_last_name_case</code></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Adds new filter hooks to modify nonces of image and file uploads
<ul>
<li><code>um_file_upload_nonce</code> </li>
<li><code>um_image_upload_nonce</code></li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Improves search member filters and keyword sensitivity</li>
<li>Improves generation of profile slugs</li>
<li>Improves force capitalization of display names with dash</li>
<li>Improves the pagination and loading of profiles in member directory</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p>Bugfixes:</p>
<ul>
<li>Fixes a bug where users in member directory are missing after updating their profile</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to generate random email when email field is not added in a form.</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to show hidden members in member directory for admins</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to validate username length on registration process</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to display profile name in dynamic menu and profile page title</li>
<li>Fixes a bug where frequent security notices show on registration process</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to assign correct role to a user on registration process</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to display correct roles in radio and dropdown fields</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to validate the reset password</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to change the assign of role in navigation menu items</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to select radio field in profile form</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to allow frontpage and posts page to handle custom access settings</li>
<li>Fixes a bug where profile role field&#8217;s conditional logic doesn&#8217;t show/hide the second field.</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to show &#8216;Last Login&#8217; field in profile edit and view mode.</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to sync roles with users in Edit Roles.</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to disable/enable UM profile cache</li>
<li>Fixes a bug to disable biography field&#8217;s character limit when added in form</li>
</ul>
</li>

<h4>1.0.46: February 8, 2015</h4>
<p>(Update Recommended)</p>
<ul>
<li>New: added Spanish language pack</li>
<li>Fixed: important JS conflict in admin when UM is active</li>
<li>Fixed: profile permalink issue for e-mail usernames</li>
<li>Fixed: installation issue on some WP databases</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.45: February 8, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: Multisite bug php Fatal error: call to undefined function wpmu_delete_user()</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.44: February 8, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>Tweak: improved performance: unused user photos are deleted when user upload</li>
<li>Tweak: cleaned up dashboard code</li>
<li>Tweak: updated current translations</li>
<li>Fixed: display name field should be updated with wp_update_user and not in usermeta</li>
<li>Fixed: admin js and css should are loaded in UM backend only</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.43: February 7, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: added German (Deutsch) language support</li>
<li>Tweak: updated all translation packs</li>
<li>Fixed: profile social links in member directory</li>
<li>Fixed: prevent storing user_pass in usermeta table</li>
<li>Fixed: php error triggered from um-access.php file</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.42: February 6, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: added option to block specific e-mail domains from registering</li>
<li>New: 2 new social profile fields: YouTube and SoundCloud</li>
<li>New: added option to show field icons in profile header</li>
<li>New: import/export plugin settings feature added to the backend</li>
<li>New: added option to duplicate forms in backend with one click</li>
<li>Tweak: cleaned up installation code</li>
<li>Tweak: minor css modifications</li>
<li>Fixed: adding HTML and iframe content to html-allowed textarea fields</li>
<li>Fixed: upload folders permissions with some configurations and servers</li>
<li>Fixed: live preview of profile forms in backend</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.41: February 5, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: added access control settings to custom post types, you can have custom access settings applied to your custom post types now</li>
<li>New: divider and spacing fields fully support conditional logic</li>
<li>Tweak: Turkish language completed</li>
<li>Tweak: updated some translations</li>
<li>Fixed: a couple of PHP warnings and errors have been resolved</li>
<li>Fixed: conflict with MailPoet plugin has been resolved</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.40: February 4, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>Tweak: line-breaks and automatic urls are now working for textarea fields</li>
<li>Tweak: updated ReduxFramework to latest version</li>
<li>Tweak: backend sentences are now properly localized / updated translation</li>
<li>Fixed: important issue with field positions in backend form builder</li>
<li>Fixed: issue with usernames that have spaces resolved</li>
<li>Fixed: conflict with page title in bbpress forums resolved</li>
<li>Fixed: issue with escaping the apostrophes resolved</li>
<li>Fixed: issue with loading more posts/comments in profile resolved</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.39: February 3, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: added support for child templates to allow customizing the templates of plugin via theme or child theme. <a href="https://ultimatemember.com/codex/overriding-default-ultimate-member-profile-templates/" rel="nofollow ugc">See how</a></li>
<li>New: added French language pack</li>
<li>Tweak: improved localization notification in backend</li>
<li>Tweak: improved template loading</li>
<li>Fixed: a minor css issue with multi-select field placeholder</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.38: February 3, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: added a built-in automatic language pack downloader</li>
<li>New: plugin now available in Italian, Turkish (40%)</li>
<li>Tweak: If you need the plugin on available language pack you can download it automatically via the dashboard</li>
<li>Tweak: when user updates account page the page will refresh and stay in the same tab</li>
<li>Fixed: possible permalinks conflict with some wordpress themes</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.37: February 2, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>Tweak: automatic line breaks in user description field</li>
<li>Tweak: added gravatar rating parameter to the gravatar function</li>
<li>Fixed: permalinks issue with customized slug for user and account pages</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.36: February 1, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: URLs in user description are automatically converted to hyperlinks</li>
<li>New: added option to redirect author archive to their UM profile automatically</li>
<li>New: added option to show asterisk next to required fields (optional)</li>
<li>New: Turkish language file (40% completed)</li>
<li>Tweak: updated language file with missing sentences and words</li>
<li>Tweak: auto redirect user/ base to user profile (e.g. user/username/)</li>
<li>Fixed: issue with wrong comments count on user profile menu</li>
<li>Fixed: issue with display name tags in nav menu</li>
<li>Fixed: issue with conditional logic for select/multi-select fields</li>
<li>Fixed: issue with conditional logic for content blocks and shortcode fields</li>
<li>Fixed: conflict with Pods wordpress plugin</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.35: January 31, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>Tweak: exif module is not required anymore and does not stop photo uploads (exif is highly recommended)</li>
<li>Fixed: issue with changing a WP administrator role to a community administrator role</li>
<li>Fixed: issue with plugin uploads directory on some multisite installations</li>
<li>Fixed: conflict with default profile tab and editing profile</li>
<li>Fixed: minor css conflict on account page with some themes when viewed on tablets</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.34: January 31, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: added option to set a default cover photo</li>
<li>New: added option to hide restricted content from search and archive</li>
<li>Fixed: php error in title tab with ElegantThemes</li>
<li>Fixed: theme conflict with photo/cover upload</li>
<li>Fixed: issue with country field showing country code in profile</li>
<li>Fixed: issue with setting default tab</li>
<li>Fixed: issue with 2-name user roles</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.33: January 30, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: Introducing profile menu / tab system (optional)</li>
<li>New: display user posts and comments in profile menu (optional)</li>
<li>New: added option to force hide adminbar on the frontend even for administrators</li>
<li>Tweak: added profile menu options to plugin settings panel</li>
<li>Tweak: added option to enable/disable profile menu and/or profile menu tabs</li>
<li>Tweak: added option to show or hide post and comment counts (when the tabs are active)</li>
<li>Tweak: account activation via e-mail redirects user to login page and displays a success message</li>
<li>Fixed: issue with conditional logic on profile fields has been resolved</li>
<li>Fixed: bug with searching members by gender</li>
<li>Fixed: admin nav menus conditional logic conflict with some themes</li>
<li>Fixed: bug with datepicker field on windows servers</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.32: January 30, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: added 3 new tags to use in email templates {first_name}, {last_name}, and {gender}</li>
<li>Fixed: Issue with account page permalink resolved &#8211; <a href="https://ultimatemember.com/forums/topic/permalink-bug/" rel="nofollow ugc">view issue</a></li>
<li>Fixed: Issue with conditional menu items showing for un-approved users resolved &#8211; <a href="https://ultimatemember.com/forums/topic/registration/" rel="nofollow ugc">view issue</a></li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.31: January 29, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: Issue with custom user page slug resolved <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/topic/translate-plugin-9">view issue</a></li>
<li>Fixed: PHP warning in members directory resolved</li>
<li>Fixed: Issue with hardcoded user profile URLs in menu</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.30: January 29, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: added option to control number of profiles to display in members directory for mobile devices</li>
<li>New: new admin action hook &#8216;um_extend_admin_menu&#8217; to extend plugin administration menu</li>
<li>New: Improved plugin accessbility e.g add alt text to links and images so people with disabilities can use screen readers</li>
<li>New: added option to show/hide the message that appears if profile is empty (includes emoticon show/hide)</li>
<li>Tweak: new translatable strings</li>
<li>Tweak: added option to customize single-result text for members directory</li>
<li>Tweak: removed unnecessary code from member directory backend</li>
<li>Tweak: removed unnecessary js from admin head</li>
<li>Fixed: Account page is now translatable</li>
<li>Fixed: content restriction widget css in backend</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.29: January 28, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: added feature to show user display name in menu (e.g. Welcome, {display_name})</li>
<li>New: added option to add text to dividers (which can be added using the drag-and-drop form builder)</li>
<li>New: security improvement: added whitelisted IP(s) option to allow you to access the WP-admin screen always (prevents lockout)</li>
<li>New: added filter hook um_whitelisted_wpadmin_access to control access to wp-admin login screens (for developers)</li>
<li>New: added custom css option to apply extra css styling rules from plugin settings</li>
<li>New: added custom css option to each form allowing you to apply extra styling rules per form</li>
<li>New: added option to customize profile fields area width (per form basis) besides global option</li>
<li>Tweak: compatibility with default permalinks (Pretty permalinks are strongly recommended though!)</li>
<li>Tweak: improved the function that gets user IP address</li>
<li>Tweak: performance: inline css from the plugin is automatically compressed/minified</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.28: January 27, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: added compatibility with wpMandrill to handle email delivery</li>
<li>Fixed: Issue with profile edit menu not appearing</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.27: January 27, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: WP admin bar issue with some plugins and themes</li>
<li>Fixed: conflict with WP Recent Comments With Avatars plugin</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.26: January 26, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: Important issue fix (update recommended)</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.25: January 26, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: addded support to use gravatars (optionally) If the user does not have a custom avatar</li>
<li>New: um_user_permissions_filter hook (for developer use)</li>
<li>Tweak: plugin uses get_avatar() properly now</li>
<li>Fixed: user avatars in backend are fixed</li>
<li>Fixed: Mobile_Detect class does not throw php error if it was previously called</li>
<li>Fixed: corrected a few translations errors</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.24: January 26, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>Tweak: predefined fields are now localized (translatable)</li>
<li>Fixed: PHP warning in comments was fixed</li>
<li>Fixed: avatars in comments</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.23: January 25, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: important bugfix with profile editing</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.22: January 25, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: option to set maximum profile fields area width</li>
<li>New: ajax functions for future development use</li>
<li>Tweak: improved profile permalinks for e-mail based usernames</li>
<li>Tweak: disable user from editing username (If admin put the username field by mistake in profile)</li>
<li>Tweak: minor css changes</li>
<li>Fixed: ability to clear conditional logic from fields in backend</li>
<li>Fixed: corrected spacing issue in a multi-column layout in profile</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.21: January 24, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: Added ajax action hook for development use</li>
<li>New: Extended profile hooks</li>
<li>New: you can restrict / apply access control to woocommerce shop page</li>
<li>Fixed: content restriction for woocommerce shop page</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.20: January 24, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: Custom email is sent to user after resetting/changing password</li>
<li>New: Added action/filter hooks to profile</li>
<li>Tweak: Improved a few core functions</li>
<li>Fixed: Encoding issue with non-english sites fixed</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.19: January 23, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: Border thickness option for members directory</li>
<li>New: Option to show/hide forgot password link on login form</li>
<li>Tweak: Capital initials on members directory</li>
<li>Fixed: Issue with row styling in form builder</li>
<li>Fixed: Conditional logic bug fixes</li>
<li>Fixed: Icon for conditional rules in backend</li>
<li>Fixed: php warning in debug mode</li>
<li>Fixed: Mobile/phone number validation fixed</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.18: January 23, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: Issue with drag and drop form builder</li>
<li>Fixed: Form builder trash icon in backend</li>
<li>Fixed: Minor css adjustments in frontend</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.17: January 22, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: WordPress Multi-site compatibility for user uploads and photos</li>
<li>Fixed: Searching members by username or email in directory (partial search supported)</li>
<li>Fixed: Anonymous tracking</li>
<li>Fixed: Minor css fixes</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.16: January 22, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: Settings page: tracking popup removed</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.15: January 22, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>New: User profiles now show a cool message if the user profile field area is empty</li>
<li>New: Added &#8216;visibility&#8217; setting to all field types in backend</li>
<li>Tweak: Members search function supports partial search matching</li>
<li>Tweak: Deleting photo or file removes file from server</li>
<li>Tweak: Deleting a user will delete all his personal uploads from the server</li>
<li>Fixed: Duplicate tooltip for password field has been removed</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.10: January 22, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>Fixed: Template tags for welcome e-mail</li>
<li>Fixed: {submitted_registration} e-mail template tag</li>
</ul>
<h4>1.0.0: January, 2015</h4>
<ul>
<li>First official release!</li>
</ul>
